name: Web app
description: Working within a team to create web app within very tight deadlines. Link on request.

name: Tree visualize
description: UI tool for entering, managing, linking between entities. User determines type of every entity and fields it has. Link on request.

name: Map builder
description: Created an UI tool to show UI controls over HUGE (16000x8000) PNG image to jump between different parts of a map. Link on request.

name: Shoe builder
description: Develop your own shoe design using step-by-step wizard

name: Oolli
description: Collector's website - find stamps, request stamps information, get stamp value estimations. Highly-scalable project.

name: Bugazza team
description: Created a team and grew it from scratch.
status: Great team. Enjoyed working with my friends every day.

name: Email-Me-Not
description: Stores account data for your online accounts, provides good unique passwords, strongly encrypts everything, provides unique email address for every account that redirects mail for your account.
status: Launched, actively using myself. For public usage must spent more time on design and bug fixing

name: Service Book
description: Low-end cell phones application to provide a local services directory. Order taxi, pizza or get latest football results using your feature phone.
status: Closed. We had great idea and business advisory, almost had our first big customer. Decided to stop development because this is not our area of competence.

name: Social game
description: Play using modern web-services like twitter or facebook. Do some social actions as a challenges.
status: Dead - after all development we figured out that there is no market for this product.

name: Appcelerator Titanium documentation system
description: Use JSDuck to run documentation system for Titanium SDK.

name: Appcelerator Mobile Web SDK
description: With my team created alpha version of Mobile Web SDK to compile Titanium Mobile application into HTML5+JS+CSS

name: Funambol Web Portal
description: Feature full web portal to work with data synchronized from your mobile devices. Used 6zap as a base.

name: Mail+Calendar+Files+Contacts+Groups
description: Enterprise level app with many interesting features.
status: Aquired by Funambol and used as a base for creating Funambol Web Portal

name: Zapatec AJAX framework
description: Commercial AJAX Framework + set of cool widgets. Since this time I didn't saw more cool grid and calendar widgets that ours.
status: Aquired by Funambol and used for creating Funambol Web Portal
